product_name: REI Inside Passage Access Bag - Special Buy
long_description: Seeking organization with a bit of outdoor style for your travels? Sturdy and well-padded, this bag gives you organizer pockets, fits underneath most airliner seats and will hold a 14-in. laptop.
short_description: Seeking organization with a bit of outdoor style for your travels? Sturdy and well-padded, this bag gives you organizer pockets, fits underneath most airliner seats and will hold a 14-in. laptop.
